summary: This bill, the Federal Firearm Licensee Act, aims to modernize the regulation of firearm sales. It addresses dealer accountability, strengthens security requirements for licensed premises, enhances record-keeping (including electronic databases and video surveillance), increases licensing fees, and expands background check requirements. It also introduces regulations for facilitators of firearm transfers and increases penalties for violations. The bill seeks to improve public safety and curb the diversion of firearms to criminals.
